mapper.insert: insert into orders (productCode, userid, couponid, recipient, rec_phoneNum, zipCode, mainAddress, detailAddress, usePoint) values (#{productCode}, #{userid}, #{couponid}, #{recipient}, #{rec_phoneNum}, #{zipCode}, #{mainAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{usePoint})
mapper.update: update orders set orderState = #{orderState} where orderCode = #{orderCode}
update product set amount = amount - #{orderAmount} where productCode = #{productCode}
